events.title: Multiverse Computing
events.content: It was a pleasure to host Ms. Irene Caceres Munoz from Multiverse Computing for an highly inspiring talk! Irene shared from her experience regarding the transition from academia to industry after a master degree. She explained several important points to keep in mind, and explained why she loves working at Multiverse Computing so much!

events.title: QML Workshop
events.content: The society holds regular workshops and lecture series on concepts in Quantum Technologies delivered by industry and academia experts.

events.title: First Society Meeting
events.content: Regular meetings to discuss the planned events and structure, and give an overview talk on the quantum technology industry. These talks include many useful resources and tips on how you could get more involved and informed with this rapidly evolvin industry.

events.title: London Quantum Summit 2021
events.content: The society subsidises and encourages attendance of quantum summits and conferences around the world for its memebers.

events.title: QHack 2022
events.content: The society organizes workshops to prepare for hackathons around the year. These include talks given by industry experts and hands on overview of software packages used.
